Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 26th overall pick, by Malibu in 1951...
Injured on 8/21/1951 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 7/17/1955, off Charles Ober (SHP)...
Earned first career win on 7/17/1955...
Was selected to the 1958 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/2/1960 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1960, going 3-0, 0.74...
Injured on 7/5/1960 with a Spasms Back, out for 5-6 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1960, going 3-0, 1.08...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/1961, off Schoolboy Johnson (SHP)...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 3/1/1966 to a minor league contract.
Released by Capital City on 4/7/1966...
Drafted in 3rd round, 64th overall pick, by Capital City in 1967...
Had first career hit on 9/8/1976, off Michael Little (PON)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/10/1980, off Carlos Lopez (PEN)...
